TopicTitle: [23.5] Realistic Solar System Kerbin Sized Config

Articles.Content:
[The Back Story of How This Was Made(In like, five minutes or so)]

I was playing Realistic Solar System and FAR kept making my rockets flip, so i cried, and deleted FAR (This isnt a rant about FAR, or me saying its bad, its just i cant fly things with realistic aerodynamics) and tried to play again. Then i realised that It was impossible to get to orbit without FAR so i cried, cried, and cried some more. Then i thought "Hey wasnt there that thing that made Realistic Solar System smaller?) so, i downloaded it, and realised i needed Planet Factory, which is a great mod, but i only wanted the Vannila stuff, so i thought "Maybe I could make it work, Without Planet Factory!"

There. Done. Happy?

All Hail The Kraken

[Description]

I 've made a change to the config files for the Realistic Solar System Mod which changes the sizes of the planets and moons to smaller values (About 1/10th like normal ksp) and the orbits have been made smaller as well. basically what this config file does is:

It makes a "Ok(ish)Ã¢â€žÂ¢" representation of ARE solar system, but in Vanilla KSP size.

[install]

1.Download Realistic Solar System

2.Convince yourself you can play it

3.Cry

4.Try summon the Kraken to help you

5.Cry(Again)

6.Come back here, and download the files

7.Drag the files into the Realistic Solar System folder in your GameData folder

8.Discover the cake is a lie

9.CryÃ¢â€žÂ¢

10.Profit

[Download]

RSS Small V 1

This is a Alpha(For lack of a better word)!

There may be bugs!

There will be bugs!

[bugs]

None Yet! i think..maybe...find some please?

[Kredits(See what i did there?)]

Me: For being fabulous

NathanKell: For being super fabulous at doing awesome ***** which makes my brain go bye bye

metaphor: For the original Config file which does this but wasn't updated

The Mighty Kraken: ALL HAIL THE KRAKEN
that is what i was looking for. any progress on that?
Dude, seriously? this is like a 5 month necro...
